articles.author: Heath Parkes-Hupton
articles.title: Dramatic arrest on Sydney bridge linked to alleged Stuart MacGill kidnapping
articles.description: Police say the arrest of a 28-year-old man on the Anzac Bridge yesterday came as part of an investigation into the alleged kidnapping of a former Test cricketer.
articles.content:
A man wanted by police in connection to the alleged kidnapping of former Test cricketer Stuart MacGill has been arrested on the side of a busy Sydney highway.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
